thread.section_title: myprojectorlamps Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of myprojectorlamps | www.myprojectorlamps.ie
thread.title: Raymond Duffy

author: Raymond Duffy
title: Raymond Duffy
text: Site should say what the lightly dispatched date and approx arrival is. Had to wait 2 weeks as purchase was not in stock. I feel an email informing me of this delay instead of me having to contact you would have been sent better customer experience. That said on very informed everything was fine and it arrived as expected. That why 4 stars and not 2 or 3.
